short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the Pin and Mute widget that shows up in the middle of the video on Google Meet meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides the Pin and Mute widget on that shows in the middle of the video on a Google Meet meeting by injecting one line of CSS to permanently hide that widget. This is useful when screen capturing a meeting while wanting to control who's on screen.
